name: Me-Flavored Water Salesman
description: He is an elderly, balding man who spends his entire time sitting naked in a barrel of water. He makes a living by selling this water.

name: Scruffles
description: Scruffles is a rather chubby, black male cat. His belly is a darker shade of black than the rest of his fur.

name: Kilt Man
description: The first time this happened was during the royal wedding when after getting a 1 Zog bounty put on his head. Everyone began to hunt Elfo, including Kilt Man, who was defeated by Elfo after he disappeared under his kilt and caused him enough pain to collapse.

attributes.First: " A Princess, an Elf, and a Demon Walk Into a Bar "

name: Queen Grogda
description: Queen Grogdais the ruler ofOgre Valleyand the wife of theKing Brockup until the latter's demise. She is also the mother ofJunior&Elfo.

name: Satan
description: Satan looks like a slender and muscular build demonic creature with black hair, a goatee and a moustache. He dresses in a suit with tie. However, his relatively handsome appearance is an illusion; in his real form, which can be seen in mirrors, he is overweight and doesn't wear clothes except for a hat and some tattered shorts. In this form he looks likeAsmodiumbut has no wings.

name: Witch
description: Witchesare humans who delved into the practice of magical arts, and normally live in the enchanted forest.

name: Lady Bowmore
description: Lady Bowmoreis a member ofThe League of Gallivanting Scrutinatorswho lives inSteamland. She has helpedBeanto explore Steamland, and tried to assist her in findingElfo. She has made several attempts to hit on Bean, all of which Bean failed to understand. In "Electric Ladyland", she sees Bean withMora, and assumes Mora is the reason Bean never returned her avances.

name: Junior
description: As seen in the trailer, the grammatical giant has quite pale skin, and is fully exposed except for a loincloth to decently cover himself. The ogre has a severe underbite, which is in contrast to the severe overbite of many of the show's characters.

name: Prince Guysbert
description: Prince Guysbertwas a member of the royal family ofBentwood. He was supposed to bePrincess Bean's fiance in an arranged wedding, until it was cancelled after Guysbert suffered a serious accident. Although handsome, he was not a typical Prince Charming, as being the offspring of the siblingsLorenzo the First, andQueen Bunnymade him somewhat unintelligent.

name: Hencho
description: He is first seen inTrøgtowninYou're the Beanwhen Dagmar has Bean,ElfoandLucilocked up in the dungeons ofTrøgtown. He letsTrixyinto the cell to bring Elfo a cake, and Bean seizes this opportunity to capture Hencho through the bars of their cell, after which Elfo and Luci knock him out and take the keys of the door from him.

name: Elastico
description: Elasticois a member of theTroll Circus Troupe. He is a contortionist and the world's stretchiesttroll. He does a lot of things that makeElfosay "that's disgusting".

name: Sir Edgar the Fearless
description: SirEdgar the Fearlesswas considered byPendergast, one of the bravest knights in theKnight of the Zøg Table. He helped in the sacking ofElfwoodto capture elves for their magical blood. He was however decapitated by a lollipop. He was then known asEdgar the Headless.

His plans all involve getting his hands on Bean's magic and ultimately making her his bride.

description: Ursulais aSelkiewho lives in theEnchanted Forest. Although normally a bear, she has the ability to turn into a human woman by removing her bear skin. She briefly datedKing ZøgofDreamland, which later caused her to give birth toJasper.

name: Emperor Cloyd
description: Emperor Cloydis a recurring antagonist inDisenchantment.He is the uncharismatic ruler of the Empire ofMaruwhich is served by his older sister,Becky the Enchantress. He is also the younger brother ofDagmar, the older brother ofJerry, and the maternal uncle of thePrincess Bean. Both he and Becky are killed by Dagmar and Bad Bean at the of the series after Dagmar feels that they are no longer useful for her anymore.

name: Chancellor of Dankmire
description: TheChancellor of Dankmireis a high-ranking politician fromDankmire, presumably reporting directly to theKing of Dankmire.

name: Hilda
description: Hilda is a girl with bright pink hair. She appears to be around the same age as Bean, who was approximately 13 years old when they first met as the comic is set 6 years prior to the events of the series. That would make her 19 by the show's present day.

name: Annoyo
description: Annoyois anElfmentioned in season two episode five: "Our Bodies, Our Elves".

name: Trixy
description: Trixy is first shown when she takes a liking to Elfo and his "relatively small" facial cavities. Somewhat assertive, she forcefully inserts herself between Elfo and two other admiring female Trøgs during their mandatory midnight supper. She offers Elfo a bowl of anchovies soaked in vinegar and mustard, something that Elfo finds incredibly savory. After dinner, Trixy decides to ambush Elfo by clinging to the ceiling of his sleep nook to be intimate with him. While apparently being loud enough ...

name: Swindler Raccoon
description: In "Beanie Get Your Gun"Prince Derekencounters him in the forest, where the raccoon is demonstrating a card-based shell game to some animals, and challenges Derek to give it a try. Derek has to guess which of three cards is the queen, but gets it wrong and the raccoon takes his wallet. Later, after Derek meetsSagatha, she tells him to try again but pay attention to the raccoon himself instead of the cards. Derek thus finds out the raccoon has a squirrel hidden up his sleeve who quickly swaps ...

name: Inky Winky
description: Inky Winky is an inmate ofP.T.s Freak show.

name: Malfus
description: MalfusorMalfus the Philosopheris a man obsessed with gaining immortality and eternal love from theElixir of Life. He was once keeper of theOmniconand theEternity Pendant, but after gaining immortality and finding out it was a curse he threw it over theEdge of the World. He was married toGwenfor 90 years before using the Elixir of life, to which she refused, and they separated. At some point, he was married toPrudence, the Queen of the Crones, but after they divorced, he spent decades on the l...

name: Washmaster
description: In "A Princess, an Elf, and a Demon Walk Into a Bar",Bean,Luci andElfosought him under false pretenses, believing his name to be the "Wishmaster" and expecting three free wishes from him. It turns out he just does laundry for people. Bean is notably disappointed upon hearing this, as she hoped to wish for her arranged marriage toPrince Merkimerto be cancelled.

name: Mrs. Mertz
description: She worries a lot about her son and "mothers" him. She thinks very highly of him and would like to introduce him toBean, telling her Bean that she looks like she is inhisleague. Her over-bearing and nagging character undermines Mertz's masculinity and bravery as a Knight.

name: Grifto
description: Griftois atrollcircus ringmaster, con artist, and professional thief. He is the leader of atraveling circus troupe with other trolls, which is also a front for committing scams and thefts. His troupe once came toDreamlandunder the pretense of beingelves, which was part of a scheme to rob theDreamland Castle's treasury vault (he lied toPrincess BeanandElfothat he wanted to reclaim elf money that was unfairly taken as taxes byKing Zøg).

name: Karly
description: She is a friend ofSagathaand is first seen when Sagatha bringsPrince DerektoFairyland. Along with Sagatha's other friends, she helps Derek man up and become less of a pushover, with her speciality being linguistics. She also attends Dereks's and Sagatha's wedding inDreamland's Cathedral.

name: Pyro
description: Pyrois a member of theTroll Circus Troupe. He is afire-breatherwho can blow fire from his mouth.

name: Asmodium
description: After Luci and Bean sneak into Hell, Asmodium confronts the two when they try to find Elfo in theBook of the Dead. Bean tries to lie her way out of it, but Luci removes her costume, revealing her to be human, and explains that he tricked both Bean and Elfo into going to Hell. Impressed by Luci's ingenuity, Asmodium upgrades Luci to a Level 2 Demon.
